attributes.action: If the Prime Minister Should Resign or leave office for any reason. A General election should be called straight away
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No government should stay in power if the prime minister should leave office for any reason.As a lot of people in this country vote for the incoming prime minister and not a particular party.So it would be very wrong for someone to run the country , who has not been elected fairly by the general public,as the leader of any party.this is not democratic!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
